turns.content: What kind of equipment do I need for hiking or biking in Győr, and where can I rent it?

As an AI language model, I don't have access to the latest information and updates of the physical world. However, in general, for hiking or biking in Győr, you will need proper gear and equipment as follows:

1. Hiking boots/shoes
2. Comfortable clothing suitable for the weather conditions
3. Backpack
4. Water bottle
5. Sunglasses and hat
6. Map and compass
7. First aid kit
8. Bike (if you prefer to bike)
9. Bike helmet (if you prefer to bike)

You can rent bikes and helmets at several locations in Győr, such as:

1. GYOEK – Bike Rentals: This rental shop offers bicycles and accessories, including helmets and locks. You can find them in the city center at Szent István Square 16, Győr.

2. Hertz Rent a Bike: This rental shop offers electric and regular bikes, helmets, and other accessories. You can find them at Dunakapu tér 4, 9021 Győr.

3. Blue Danube Cycle: This rental shop offers bikes, electric bikes, and other accessories. They are located at Bajcsy-Zsilinszky út 17., 9024 Győr.

Always check availability and pricing online or by calling each rental shop in advance.
I'll make sure to check out those rental shops before heading out on my hiking or biking adventure in Győr.
Have a great time exploring Győr. Don't forget to stay hydrated and take breaks when needed. And always follow the safety guidelines for hiking and biking in the area. Enjoy your adventure!
Will these rental shops provide me with a map or do I need to get one beforehand?

Usually, rental shops provide a map of the area where you can hike or bike. However, it's always a good idea to have a map with you as a backup or in case the rental shop doesn't have any available. You can get a map of Győr and its surrounding areas at the local tourist office or from any travel agency in the city. Alternatively, you can also download maps from various mobile apps specifically designed for hiking and cycling.
